abilities.name: Withering Dust
abilities.effect: As long as Beautifly is in play, do not apply Resistance for all Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Parallel Gain
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon, including Beautifly.
